      • eval

        public void eval(Task occurrence)
        Evaluate the grounding script associated with given occurrence. Note: This method is thread-safe, which means that it can be safely called on other than the Disco thread (as long, of course as the script does not reference $disco). Grounding scripts typically need to be executed on the application (e.g., game) thread.
